title: Which diet is the best for the brain and body?
content: PREVIOUS This vaping flavour does the same damage to your lungs as cigarettes SETTINGS OFFHD HQ SD LOUP NEXT Hawaii community hangs on in shadow of fiery volcano Which diet is the best for the brain and body?Duration: 00:36 22-05-2018 SHARE SHARE TWEET SHARE EMAIL According to a report by Business Insider, eating healthy may not be an easy task, but evidence has built to support the Mediterranean diet, aplan that emphasizes consuming vegetables, healthy fats, and protein while limiting exposure to processed foods. While many different versions of the plan exist, most of its iterations have been linked with key benefits for losing weight, protecting your heart as you age, and keeping your mind sharp. contentWithMarkup: According to a report by Business Insider, eating healthy may not be an easy task, but evidence has built to support the Mediterranean diet, aplan that emphasizes consuming vegetables, healthy fats, and protein while limiting exposure to processed foods. While many different versions of the plan exist, most of its iterations have been linked with key benefits for losing weight, protecting your heart as you age, and keeping your mind sharp.
